short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show relevant weather forecast according to selected hobby

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:

Introducing "Weather by Hobby", Your Personalized Weather Experience:

Experience weather forecasts tailored to your hobbies with "Weather by Hobby", the innovative Chrome extension developed by MediaJoy. Now, every time you open a new tab/popup, "Weather by Hobby" brings you not just weather updates, but an immersive experience that aligns with your interests. Choose your favorite hobby from a diverse range in the drop-down menu, and "Weather by Hobby" will display the latest weather conditions specific to your chosen pastime.

Key Features:

Personalized Weather Forecasts: Select your hobby from the drop-down list, and "Weather by Hobby" will deliver accurate and relevant weather forecasts based on your chosen activity. Whether you're a hiker, cyclist, surfer, or biker, stay prepared with weather updates tailored just for you.

Inspiring Backgrounds: Immerse yourself in the world of your chosen hobby with captivating background images that reflect your interests. From scenic mountain trails to sun-kissed beaches, enjoy visually stunning backgrounds that enhance your browsing experience.

Convenient Search Bar: Whether you're researching new hiking trails, planning a bike route, or simply searching the web, "Weather by Hobby" offers a user-friendly search bar right at your fingertips. Streamline your online activities without leaving your tab page.

Stay Informed, Stay Inspired:

Whether you're a sports enthusiast, nature lover, or creative soul, "Weather by Hobby" ensures you're always in the loop about the weather conditions that matter to you. Stay inspired, plan your activities effectively, and enjoy seamless browsing, all in one place.

MediaJoy:
"Weather by Hobby" is brought to you by MediaJoy, committed to enhancing your online experience. 

By clicking “ADD TO CHROME”, you accept and agree to install the "Weather by hobby" tabs extension and setting Chrome new tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in our Terms of use and Privacy policy 

For more details about our privacy practices, please review our Privacy Policy: https://media-joy.co/pp.html.
To understand the terms of using our extension, please visit our Terms of Use: https://media-joy.co/eula.html.

Transform your new tab experience. Click "ADD TO CHROME" and start enjoying personalized weather forecasts, inspiring backgrounds, and convenient searching, all centered around your favorite hobbies. "Weather by Hobby" - Where Weather Meets Passion!

You may uninstall the extension at any time
To remove our extension from Google Chrome:

1) Click on the three vertical dots icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser
2) Go to "Settings"
3) In the left menu that appears, click on "Extensions"
4) From the list of installed Extensions, locate the extension you would like to uninstall



Support url:
https://media-joy.co/contact-us/index.html
